name: Robber Raccoon
description:
On the hunt for shiny objects!

In this game, control a truck driving raccoon on the run from the law as you pick up and deliver gold to your hideout- but don't get caught!

Risk/Reward: The more you deliver at once, the higher your score! But you'll be weighed down and, if caught, treasures go back where they were found!

Top Dog: Enter your name for High Scores or Best Completion time across the stages!

Enemy Ai: Evade up to 3 unique animal cops (Pig, Dog and Rabbit) by learning their movement patterns!

Location, location: 6 unique maps that will challenge your ability to think fast and adapt to your surroundings!

Game Art By: Noel Salas 

https://noeldsalas.wixsite.com/portfolio
